shared.missing_default_historical: Database do not contain default weather historical value.

dss.warning_header: One or more crop, pest & DSS combinations already exists. Please check response body for more information.

dss.model_missing_metadata: The DSS with ID '{0}' and version '{1}', do not have any model with ID '{2}' and version '{3}' on the DSS microservice.

data_share.request_error: Request do not belong to the user.
data_share.user_not_registered: User is not registered in the system.
data_share.user_without_profile: User do not have a profile in the system.
data_share.own_request_error: User can not request its own data.
data_share.user_requesting_no_profile: User requesting data share do not have a profile in the system.
data_share.declined_request: The user has declined access to the data.
data_share.existing_request: You have already requested data to this user.
data_share.not_existing_request: Request do not exist in the system or already accepted/declined.
data_share.email_error: Request created but error sending email.
data_share.wrong_method: The method is for accepting or declining requests.
data_share.no_farms_error: User do not have any farms in the system.
data_share.farms_ownership_error: Farms do not belong to the user.
data_share.pending_change_error: You can not update a pending request. Please use the 'reply' end point to accept/decline request.

weather.next_season: Weather data is not currently available for next season, please try again after {0}

weather.no_json_format: Weather data received in not in a JSON format.
weather.validation_error: Weather data received failed the Weather validation schema. This might be because the weather data source selected do not accept weather parameters required by the DSS: {0}
